item.description:
Proceeds donated for Quincy scholarships allowing HS students the opportunity to continue their education in memory of a former student Bill Dunn Jr.

For more information www.RememberB.com.

- Registration 7-8:30 AM. Start time: 9 AM
- St. Thomas Aquinas Hall, Darrow St. Houghs Neck, Quincy MA.
- $15 Preregistration (before June 15) $20 Day of Race.
(Registration forms avail. www.RememberB.com)
- Tee Shirts to 1st 600 registered participants.
- CASH prizes for 1st Place Male/Female & for 1st place Houghs Neck Male/Female
Resident. Medals awarded to top 3 in each age group.

Celebration after race includes: Free BBQ, snacks/drinks, music, raffles, awards, cash bar, running times posted.

Let's meet at the front door of the registration hall at 8:00 am. NOTE: plan to arrive early as parking is limited or park down the street where ever you find a spot.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at front door of registration building at 8:00 a.m. located directly behind the Most Blessed Sacrament Church

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Memorial Road Race - Quincy Houghs Neck - 5 mile run or 2 mile walk
